Description: Canada's main stock index fell on Thursday from a record high scaled in the previous session, as material stocks tracked weakness in gold prices following strong U S jobs data
Title: CANADA STOCKS TSX falls as material stocks weigh Reuters
Author: Reuters Staff

Description: Canada's main stock index rose on Tuesday, driven by gains in energy and gold stocks as underlying commodity prices gained, while investors awaited key U S economic data due later this week
Title: CANADA STOCKS TSX boosted by energy, gold stocks
Author: Reuters Staff

Description: Pope Francis said on Sunday that he was pained by the discovery of the remains of 215 children at a former Catholic school for indigenous students in Canada and called for respect of the rights and culture of native peoples
Title: Pope calls for reconciliation, healing over Canada school discovery Reuters
Author: Philip Pullella

Description: Canada's main stock index opened higher on Tuesday, as energy stocks gained tracking crude prices, as investors eyed the U S Federal Reserve's meeting this week for cues on the tapering of its monetary policy
Title: CANADA STOCKS TSX opens higher on energy boost Reuters
Author: Reuters Staff

Description: Access to trustworthy information is important to all of us, and it s vital for society to continue supporting the reporters who work tirelessly to deliver us news That s why today we are announcing new investments to continue our support of Canadian newsroo
Title: We re expanding our support of news in Canada
Author: Sabrina GeremiaVP Canada
